attributes.action: review the NHS pay offer 2007/2008 for Registered Dietitians
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
NHS Registered Dietitians in England and Wales have been offered 2.5% pay rise for 2007/2008, which equates to 1.9% in real terms with inflation (RPI) standing at 4.4%.
We, the undersigned, feel this is effectively a pay-cut, and undermines our professional status and value.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "review the NHS pay offer 2007/2008 for Registered Dietitians."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page13776.asp

Prime Minister's Office
